## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Placement Issues
- Entity placement distance errors (steps 80,82) - Always verify player is within 10 tiles before placement
- Entity collision errors (step 83) - Implement complete terrain checks (water/obstacles) before placement
- Missing entity lookups (step 80) - Verify entity existence before interaction attempts

### Fluid System Problems
- Pipe connection failures (steps 81,84-87) - Validate all connection points are unobstructed
- Long-distance pipe connections - Avoid connecting distant fluid systems (>20 tiles)
- Offshore pump positioning - Verify water access and connection orientation

### Power System Validation
- Power pole placement - Clear target positions completely before placement
- Entity power verification - Confirm power connections before asserting operational status
- Steam engine validation - Ensure both power and fluid connections are established

### Construction Best Practices
1. Verify inventory before all placement operations
2. Implement complete clearance checks for constructions
3. Validate power connections immediately after placement
4. Check fluid system integrity after modifications
5. Confirm entity positions before interaction
6. Maintain proximity (<10 tiles) during placement operations
7. Verify terrain suitability before placement attempts
8. Test connections incrementally during complex builds
